page.title: 05CLUBS: DANE END & AREA
page.content: {UNIFORMED CLUBS:}Cubs and scouts are for boys. They play games and work for badges and enter competitions. Brownies and guides are for girls and they do similar activities. The{YOUTH CLUB}meets in a new hut which they have built in Horses Meadow. The{Dance Club}meets once a week in the Memorial Hall. The {TODDLERS CLUB}meets once a week, the mother's talk whilst the children play. {ADULT CLUBS:}Dane End Theatre club has two major productions each year and one for the Old Aged Pensioners at Christmas.{The Friendship Club}is for people over 65 years of age. The {Women's Institute}and the{Local {History Society}meet once a month and have interesting talks and outings. {SPORTS CLUBS:}There is a{Football Club a{Cricket Club}and{Badminton Club.
